value.name:
RESTORED is used for revertive groups to indicate a return to the normal state.

This literal has
NOT_APPLICABLE is used upon retrieval of switch data for non-revertive groups, if a more precise value is not available.
MANUAL switch indicates that a manual operation caused this switch, including MANUAL, FORCED and LOCKOUT switches.

AUTOMATIC_SWITCH is used when the switch reason for the automatic switch is not known.

This literal
SIGNAL_MISMATCH is used in the case the signal is ok, but is identified as coming from an incorrect source: TRAIL_TRACE_IDEN
